content.question: The first derivative of the function f is given by <math> <semantics> <mrow> <msup> <mi>f</mi> <mo>′</mo> </msup> <mrow><mo>(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><msup> <mi>x</mi> <mn>4</mn> </msup> <mo>−</mo><mn>12</mn><msup> <mi>x</mi> <mn>3</mn> </msup> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@41EE@</annotation> </semantics> </math>.
